NODE.DESCRIPTION: set the path of the map defining the relations id mappings

NODE.DESCRIPTION: Set the dedup orchestrator name

NODE.DESCRIPTION: wait configurations

NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the BETA AGGREGATOR graph

NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the PROD AGGREGATOR graph

NODE.DESCRIPTION: wait configurations

NODE.name: mergeAggregatorGraphs
NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the AGGREGATOR graph

NODE.name: promoteActionsRaw
NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the RAW graph

NODE.name: graphCleaningFirst
NODE.DESCRIPTION: clean the properties in the graph typed as Qualifier according to the vocabulary indicated in schemeid

NODE.name: patchHostedBy
NODE.DESCRIPTION: updates publication's hostedby info according to the ISSNs available from DOAJ and UNIBI

NODE.name: graphResolution
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Resolve Relation

NODE.name: graphEntityGrouping
NODE.DESCRIPTION: Resolve Relation

NODE.name: duplicateScan
NODE.DESCRIPTION: search for duplicates in the raw graph

NODE.name: promoteActionsIIS
NODE.DESCRIPTION: create the INFERRED graph

NODE.name: dedupConsistency
NODE.DESCRIPTION: mark duplicates as deleted and redistribute the relationships

NODE.name: orcidPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: propagates ORCID among results linked by allowedsemrels semantic relationships

NODE.name: bulkTagging
NODE.DESCRIPTION: mark results respecting some rules as belonging to communities

NODE.name: affiliationPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: creates relashionships between results and organizations when the organizations are associated to institutional repositories

NODE.name: communityOrganizationPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: marks as belonging to communities the result collected from datasources related to the organizations specified in the organizationCommunityMap

NODE.name: resultProjectPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: created relation between projects and results linked to other results trough allowedsemrel semantic relations linked to projects

NODE.name: communitySemrelPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: tag as belonging to communitites result in in allowedsemrels relation with other result already linked to communities

NODE.name: countryPropagation
NODE.DESCRIPTION: associated to results colleced from allowedtypes and those in the whithelist the country of the organization(s) handling the datasource it is collected from

NODE.name: graphCleaning
NODE.DESCRIPTION: clean the properties in the graph typed as Qualifier according to the vocabulary indicated in schemeid

NODE.name: blacklistRelations
NODE.DESCRIPTION: removes blacklisted relations
